https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nwJnkCghNpjnJ6GkSDg5YYooGV4.jpg Following his dismissal from a television reality show, a deranged young man lures a group of beautiful coeds to his abode by telling them they will be the stars of a new show he is creating. What the women do not know is that when they lose their slot on the show, they lose their lives as well. Cruel World
